message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested in the product but $90 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $82.50 for the product.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  To be honest, I was hoping to spend closer to $70. Would you be willing to go down to $70?
I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $75, but I'm not going any lower than that.
